text: Karishma Lala Sharma (born 22 December 1993) is an Indian actress and model known for portraying Ragini in Ragini MMS: Returns, Aaina in Ujda Chaman, Tina in Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2 and Isha in Hum - I'm Because of Us. Sharma was born in Mumbai. She lived in Delhi and Patna before returning to Mumbai. == Movies == Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2015 Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2 Tina 2018 Hotel Milan Shaheen 2019 Fastey Fasaatey Anisha Super 30 Unnamed Song: "Paisa" Ujda Chaman Aaina 2022 Ek Villain Returns Siya == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1993 births Category:Indian movie actors Category:Living people
title: Karishma Sharma
